sources.title: The Mark of Cain
sources.description: Title: The Mark of Cain Summary: An attractive young French girl instigates rivalry between two brothers when she becomes the bride of the younger one. Directed by: Brian Desmond Hurst Actors: Eric Portman, Sally Gray, Patrick Holt Production Company: Two Cities Films Release Date: 15 March 1948 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Color: Black and White An attractive young French girl instigates rivalry between two brothers when she becomes the bride of the younger one.

metadata.Plot: An attractive young French girl instigates rivalry between two brothers when she becomes the bride of the younger one.
metadata.Writer: Christianna Brand, Francis Crowdy, W.P. Lipscomb
metadata.Actors: Eric Portman, Sally Gray, Patrick Holt
